alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 05 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of east Tennessee, including the following counties, Carter, Johnson and Sullivan. Portions of southwest Virginia, including the following county and independent city, City of Bristol and Washington. * WHEN...Until 915 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Johnson City, Kingsport, Bristol Tn, Bristol Va, Elizabethton, Hampton, Walnut Hill, Central, Bluff City, Watauga, Hunter, Morril`s Cave, Sadie, South Holston Dam, Rocky Mount State Park, Blountville, Doeville, Tri-City Airport and Bloomingdale. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
